Plot Conservation Results

Source: R/calculate_conservation.R
plot_conservation.Rd

This function creates visualizations for gene conservation analysis results.

Usage

plot_conservation(
  conservation_results,
  plot_type = "scatter",
  highlight_n = 5,
  original_data = NULL,
  gene_subset = NULL,
  file_path = NULL
)

Arguments

conservation_results

Output from calculate_conservation function

plot_type

Type of plot to create: "scatter", "histogram", or "heatmap" (default: "scatter")

highlight_n

Number of top and bottom conserved genes to highlight (default: 5)

original_data

Original data matrix for heatmap (required only for heatmap plot)

gene_subset

Subset of genes to include in heatmap (default: all genes)

file_path

Path to save the plot (optional)

Value

A ggplot2 object or creates a plot file
